entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11 except minus 5 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 11 except minus 5 near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
